import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';function Card(props){// current user context
var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);// Checking if current user is the owner of the current card
var isOwn=props.owner._id===currentUser._id;//variable for delete button class name
var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__delete ".concat(isOwn?'element__delete_show':'element__delete_hidden');// Check if the card was liked by the current user

var cardLikeButtonClassName="element__like ".concat(isLiked?'element__like_active':'element__like');function handleClick(){props.onCardClick(props.card);}function handleLike(){props.onLickeClick(props.card);}function handleDelete(){props.onDeleteClick(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"element__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button","aria-label":"delete-card",className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDelete}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__photo",src:props.src,alt:props.alt,onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"element__name",children:props.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__likes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button","aria-label":"like-card",className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLike}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"element__like_count",children:props.likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
